name: Attuned_Essence_Transfer_F
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. This enhancement gives many of your damaging powers a 12% chance to heal you for a minor amount. Additionally, this enhancement reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.RechargeTime.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.
power_short_helps: Increases Attack Rate, Global Heal Proc
